root.title: u.s. commerc secretari sai export rise need
root.body: commerc secretari malcolm baldrig sai releas sharpli lower januari lead indic index pickup export need best tonic economi now pickup net export sai statement depart report index fall 1.0 pct januari decemb sharpest drop sinc 1.7 pct fall juli 1984 main reason januari declin 2.3 pct decemb rise declin build permit new order plant equip consum industri good
